Hallo!

 

I got a question on my forum. It's a Japanese sword Mei: Tamban no Kami
Fujiwara terukado or tamban no kami terukado saku. You can se pitchers on
this link:  http://www.sharpweaponcenter.com/portal/index.php?option=com_smf
<http://www.sharpweaponcenter.com/portal/index.php?option=com_smf&Itemid=114
&?topic=204.msg548;topicseen#new>
&Itemid=114&?topic=204.msg548;topicseen#new. At the bottom of the page. 

 

Please can any one tell more about this sword?

You can send me the answer here.
